full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO RGYUD BLA MA'I BSTAN BCOS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO RGYUD BLA MA'I BSTAN BCOS MGON PO BYAMS PAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DPAL GRONG KHYER DPE MED KYI MKHAS PA CHEN PO BRAM ZE RIN CHEN RDO RJE'I DPON PO PAndI TA MKHAS PA CHEN PO SAD DZNY'A NA DANG, LO TZTSA BA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS GRONG KHYER DPE MED DU BSGYUR BA'O,, ,,DES DON MDO SDE GANGS RI'I NGOS LAS 'ONGS, ,DON GNAS RNAM PA BDUN GYI RLABS PHRENG GA-YO, ,RGYAL SRAS DED DPON BYE BA'I 'JUG DOGS MCHOG ,RGYAL TSAB DAM PA'I GSUNG RGYUN 'O MA'I MTSOR, ,'JUG 'DOD BLO GSAL YONGS KYI DGA' STON PHYIR, ,MKHYEN YANGS BKA' BCU ' JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,BKOD LEGS PAR GYI RI MOR BSKRUN PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BCU GNYIS @028B SA YI DPAL THOB SHOG , ,,CES PA 'DI NI SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,(SMRAS PA,  MI PHAM ZHAL LUNG BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGA YI, ,GANGGA'I CHU RGYUN RING DU SPEL BA'I PHYIR, ,CHOS RGYUN 'DZAD MED PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,DGE SLONG LUNG RTOGS DGE SLONG CHOS DUNG SOGS, ,BREL THOGS LTOS BCAS MA RGAN SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU BYAMS PA MGON PO YIS, ,BRAL MED RJES BZUNG THEG MCHOG LAM STON STE, , THOS BSAM BSGOM PA'I BYA BA MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,HAL HA'I GA-YAS RU TA LAS GUNG GI DGON PO BKRA SHOG DGE 'DUN BYAMS PA'I GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
